'''Holy Light''' is a monster-only spell which functions as a [[holy]] elemental Bolt spell, dealing heavy holy damage to anything along its path. As it deals holy damage, its damage output varies dramatically based on your character's [[species]] and [[god]]:

*[[Demonspawn]] and [[undead]]: 150%
*Followers of [[evil]] gods: 100%
*Followers of [[good]] gods: 0%
*Other: 50%

The following monsters cast Holy Light:
*[[Silver star]]

==History==
Holy Light was removed in [[0.15]].
